fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Ahold Delhaize furthers its interests vis-à-vis the European institutions and other stakeholders. The company is member of EuroCommerce and the ERRT and participates inter alia in the Retailers' Environmental Action Programme (REAP).
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Member of the ERRT and EuroCommerce. Moreover, Ahold Delhaize is a member of the Retailers' Environmental Action Programe (REAP).
goals__remit: Ahold Delhaize is an international retailing group, selling excellent food and non-food products both via shops and the internet in Europe and the United States.
